InitBlock.name: Current Usage Accelerator Refresh Date

DBMapItem.name: SQLServer70
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT DAY_DT, PER_NAME_WEEK, PER_NAME_MONTH, JULIAN_MONTH_NUM, PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D WHERE CONVERT (CHAR(12),DAY_DT,3) = CONVERT (CHAR(12),(SELECT MAX(ACTUAL_START_TS) FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_ETL_RUN_S), 3)

DBMapItem.name: DB2AS400
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT DAY_DT, PER_NAME_WEEK, PER_NAME_MONTH, JULIAN_MONTH_NUM, PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D WHERE CAST(DAY_DT as DATE FORMAT 'DD-MMM-YY') = (SELECT CAST(MAX(ACTUAL_START_TS) as DATE FORMAT 'DD-MMM-YY') FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_ETL_RUN_S)

DBMapItem.name: DB2V7
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT DAY_DT, PER_NAME_WEEK, PER_NAME_MONTH, JULIAN_MONTH_NUM, PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D WHERE date(DAY_DT)=date ((select max(LOAD_DT) FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_ETL_RUN_S))

DBMapItem.name: DB2V8
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT DAY_DT, PER_NAME_WEEK, PER_NAME_MONTH, JULIAN_MONTH_NUM, PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D WHERE date(DAY_DT)=date ((select max(LOAD_DT) FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_ETL_RUN_S))

DBMapItem.name: TeradataV2R5
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT DAY_DT, PER_NAME_WEEK, PER_NAME_MONTH, JULIAN_MONTH_NUM, PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D WHERE CAST(DAY_DT as DATE FORMAT 'DD-MMM-YY') = (SELECT CAST(MAX(ACTUAL_START_TS) as DATE FORMAT 'DD-MMM-YY') FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_ETL_RUN_S)

DBMapItem.Value: SELECT DAY_DT, PER_NAME_WEEK, PER_NAME_MONTH, JULIAN_MONTH_NUM, PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D WHERE CAST(DAY_DT as DATE FORMAT 'DD-MMM-YY') = (SELECT CAST(MAX(ACTUAL_START_TS) as DATE FORMAT 'DD-MMM-YY') FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_ETL_RUN_S)

DBMapItem.name: TeradataV2R6
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT DAY_DT, PER_NAME_WEEK, PER_NAME_MONTH, JULIAN_MONTH_NUM, PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D WHERE CAST(DAY_DT as DATE FORMAT 'DD-MMM-YY') = (SELECT CAST(MAX(ACTUAL_START_TS) as DATE FORMAT 'DD-MMM-YY') FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_ETL_RUN_S)

DBMapItem.name: SQLServer2005
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT DAY_DT, PER_NAME_ENT_WEEK, PER_NAME_ENT_PERIOD, JULIAN_MONTH_NUM, PER_NAME_ENT_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D WHERE CONVERT (CHAR(12),DAY_DT,3) = CONVERT (CHAR(12),(SELECT MAX(ACTUAL_START_TS) FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_ETL_RUN_S), 3)

DBMapItem.name: DefaultMulDB
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT DAY_DT, PER_NAME_WEEK, PER_NAME_MONTH, JULIAN_MONTH_NUM, PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D WHERE W_CURRENT_CAL_DAY_CODE ='Current'

InitBlock.InitString: SELECT DAY_DT, PER_NAME_WEEK, PER_NAME_MONTH, JULIAN_MONTH_NUM, PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D WHERE W_CURRENT_CAL_DAY_CODE ='Current'
